#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<math.h>
#define SIZE 1000006
using namespace std;
int p[SIZE];
int main(){
int T,i,j;
long long  N,x;
p[0]=p[1]=1;
for(j=4;j<SIZE;j+=2) p[j]=1;
for(i=3;i<=1000;i=i+2){
	for(j=i*i;j<SIZE;j+=2*i)
			p[j]=1;
}
scanf("%d",&T);

while(T--){
scanf("%lld",&N);
x=sqrt(N);
if((x*x==N)&&!p[x])
		printf("YES\n");
else
		printf("NO\n");


}		
return 0;		

}
